name: 2BBee
description:
WHAT IS LIKE TO BE A BEE?

Not many people realize how hard these little creatures work every day. Every day, one bee pollinates up to 17,000 thousand flowers, and in its entire life - more than a million. Do you want to dive into the world of bees?

GAMEPLAY

An open world survival sandbox game where you have to try on the role of a bee.

Your tasks - is to pollinate as many flowers as possible and collect enough honey for the next generation. But be careful, distribute your forces correctly in search of new flowers, do not fly too far for a new flower. And most importantly - do not get caught by enemies, and if you have already got caught, then you will have to fight for your life and the life of new generations!

DON'T BE LOST

If you are still lost, you can use the "sixth sense" to determine the location of the house.

But remember that the effect of the ability is limited and it has a cooldown.

FIND MORE

If there are no flowers left in the area nearby - don't worry! Activate the ability to detect flowers that are out of sight.


You can combine this ability with "sixth sense" to get home safely.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Explore the world in search of new flowers
  • Monitor vitality readings and replenish it
  • Bring honey home to raise a new generation
  • Think over a travel strategy to explore as much as possible - energy is used to move
  • Fight opponents - they will not only attack you, but also destroy flowers
  • Survive as long as possible and set new records
  • Take a closer look at the flowers - some of them can regenerate

What is like 2B Bee?
